description: Stable slug identifier for the show title; primary key for titles; FK for episodes.
Last air year (same as start for single-year shows).
Total number of episodes across all seasons.
Original Korean broadcast network or Netflix if produced for Netflix.
Netflix labeling (Original vs Exclusive international distribution vs Licensed).

example: Hyun Bin; Son Ye-jin; Seo Ji-hye
A South Korean heiress crash-lands in North Korea and is protected by an army officer.

description: Link to the show’s Netflix landing page when available.
Slug ID; foreign key to titles.show_id.
Episode index within the season, starting at 1.
Episode runtime in minutes (copied from titles by default).
Availability flag for Netflix US (illustrative; training only).
Availability flag for Netflix Canada (illustrative; training only).
Availability flag for Netflix UK (illustrative; training only).
Availability flag for Netflix South Korea (illustrative; training only).
ISO date the availability snapshot was generated.
